postgres.weather_create_query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS weather ( name VARCHAR NOT NULL, region VARCHAR,    country VARCHAR,lat DECIMAL(9, 6),long DECIMAL(9, 6), timezone VARCHAR,local_time TIMESTAMP, temp_c DECIMAL(5, 2),feelslike_c DECIMAL(5, 2),condition VARCHAR,condition_icon VARCHAR,wind_kph DECIMAL(6, 2),    pressure_mb DECIMAL(6, 2),    precipitation_mm DECIMAL(6, 2),    humidity DECIMAL(5, 2),    cloud DECIMAL(5, 2),    uv_index SMALLINT,    visibility_km DECIMAL(6, 2),    last_updated_epoch BIGINT,created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
postgres.weather_insert_query: INSERT INTO weather ( name, region, country, lat, long, timezone, local_time,   temp_c, feelslike_c, condition, condition_icon, wind_kph,    pressure_mb, precipitation_mm, humidity, cloud,   uv_index, visibility_km, last_updated_epoch) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s);
